chapter.text: Savgand ʙa saʙ, on goh ki cahonro ʙo torikias ʙipusad
va savgand ʙa ruz, on goh ki oskor savad
va savgand, ʙa on ki naru modaro ʙijofarid
ki hosili kusishoi sumo gunogun ast
Ammo kase, ki ʙaxsoisu parhezgori kard
va on ʙehtarinro tasdiq kard (kalimai tajiʙaro)
pas ʙaroi ʙihist omodaas mekunem
Ammo on kas ki ʙaxilivu ʙeehtijoci kard
va on ʙehtarinro takziʙ kard (duruƣ ʙarovard)
uro ʙaroi duzax omoda mesozem
Va cun halokas darrasad, doroijas ʙa holas foida naʙaxsad
Va on ci ʙar Most, rohnamoist
Va az oni Most on cahonu in cahon
Pas sumoro az otase, ki zaʙona mezanad, metarsonam
cuz ahli ʙadʙaxti ʙa on darnajaftad
on ki duruƣ ʙarovard va rujgardon sud
Va parhezgortarin mardumro az on dur dorand
on ki moli xud meʙaxsojad va poki mecujad
Va hec kasro ʙar (gardani) u haqqe naʙosad, ki aknun mukofot xohad
Ƣajri custani xusnudii Parvardigori ʙalandmartaʙai xud
Va ʙa zudi xusnud savad
